summary: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.
cast: Ethan Hawke|Julie Delpy|Vernon Dobtcheff|Louise Lemoine Torrès|Rodolphe Pauly|Mariane Plasteig|Diabolo|Denis Evrard|Albert Delpy|Marie Pillet
title: Antes del atardecer
